Key Match Events: Buddy Hield scored 28 points and 7 3-pointers in the Warriors' 124-106 comeback victory over the New Orleans Pelicans
Pre-Game Insights: The Warriors will face the same Pelicans for a home rematch on Wednesday night
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lindy Waters III scored 21 points and grabbed a career-high eight rebounds in the Warriors' win over the Pelicans
Others: The Warriors' depth and perimeter shooting was on full display
The Warriors will look to build off the positive momentum against a familiar opponent
Zion Williamson and Brandon Ingram combined for 61 points in the Pelicans' loss to the Warriors
The Warriors did a great job limiting shot creator CJ McCollum and sharpshooter Jordan Hawkins
